Name: The Magic Land
About the game: The Magic Land is a massive online role-playing game where people live in a magical world of adventures, In an MMORPG people from all over the world meet on a virtual playground to explore areas, solve tricky riddles and undertake heroic exploits. Players are faced with the challenge of developing the skills of their selected characters, exploring a large variety of areas and dangerous dungeons and interacting with other players on a social and diplomatic level.
